metadata.name: HypeX Warrior
metadata.description: The HypeX Warrior - winner of The HypeX MetaSneaker Brawl Design Competition - the first digital sneaker design competition for the metaverse. Over 160 designers. From 29 countries. The HypeX Warrior is created by designer Chad L. Tanutan of the Philippines. This NFT features metaverse wearable technology, play to earn, future whitelisting, staking, airdrop, and other potential utilities in the future. Only 500 will ever be minted.
